original_title: アルバイトのあざと可愛い誘惑に負けた僕は、密会ゲス不倫セックスに溺れてしまった…。

Staring at her with a charming smile and secretly whispering in her ear... A bruise that drives a man crazy and a forced temptation that is too erotic. Before I knew it, I had forgotten about my wife, children, and work, and was immersed in sex... title: I Was Seduced Into Cheating On My Wife With The Cute Part-time Girl From Work, Starring Natsu Hinata
